data.title: A Long to A Site Post Plant Snakebite
data.description: A good snakebite to prevent the enemies from defusing the bomb while you tick down the timer.

data.title: C Long to C Site Toxic Screen
data.description: This wall is useful for aggressively pushing onto C Site. You mostly have to worry about defending in the back of C, but you completely block off the rotations from defender spawn and garage.

data.title: C Site to C Link One Way Smoke
data.description: One way smoke to help defend against site retakes from CT

data.title: Grass to B Site Snakebite
data.description: A good snakebite to prevent the enemies from defusing the bomb while you tick down the timer.
